name: Invercity (Marudice)
description:
Handstand looks like hanging when you look it upside down, doesn't it?

Invercity is a puzzle-platformer that features "Handstand".

The game has two important mechanics: "Handstand" and "World reversal".

You can always do "Handstand".
It reverses gravity for all objects but you for the physics principal law; "things fall to bottom".

"World reversal", it is simply a matter of perspective. You will look the world upside down.
You would have been handstanding, but it might have been replaced by a hanging, though.

This confusing puzzles would take more than one hour to complete all levels.

game development contest "unity1week" #15 winner
